snippet.title: Outward Pre-Alpha Trailer E3 2015
snippet.description:
Outward is the third project for Nine Dots Studio. It's an open world RPG that brings a new approach to the genre. Rather than offering a power fantasy, Outward is aiming to create a more believable simulation of what it would be like to live the life of an adventurer.

You need to think before you act, you need to think of your basic needs such as to eat or sleep and the world isn't centered around you.

In Outward, you are not a demi-god or the hero from an ancient prophecy. You can't overpower armies single handedly, you have to be clever and prepared.

Moreover, Outward can be played both solo or coop, either locally in splitscreen or online.

To learn more, check out our website at www.ninedotsstudio.com
